1.0.0.name: wordpress/live-blog
1.0.0.description:
Live blog using Blyve's Wordpress plugin. Blyve is the premier live blogging event platform for Wordpress. Blyve provides brands, publishers, and bloggers like yourself a better way to engage and connect with an audience.

Blyve's interactive live event platform will let you post updates, interact directly with your readers and their comments, add pictures and video imagery to your reporting, polls, tweets, post to Facebook and Twitter, and much more - all in real- time. Most importantly, you will have access to Blyve's advanced moderation controls that give you the power to choose what is published into your live event.
